description: Updates the currently set system settings, which include the IAM Role used for resource snapshot jobs.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog in which the settings will be updated. Acceptable values include AWS for production and Sandbox for testing environments.

nested_items.name: Catalog
nested_items.description: Specifies the catalog in which the settings are defined. Acceptable values include AWS for production and Sandbox for testing environments.

nested_items.name: ResourceSnapshotJobRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the IAM Role used for resource snapshot job executions.
